invoiceData.remarkDetails: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum.
This invoice is currently under review by the admin department. All necessary documentation has been submitted and is awaiting final approval.
Invoice has been approved by the finance department. Payment processing will begin within 2-3 business days.
This invoice requires additional verification. The accounts team is currently reviewing the supporting documents.
Invoice has been rejected due to missing documentation. Please resubmit with complete supporting documents.
This invoice is under legal review due to contractual terms. Legal team will provide feedback within 5 business days.
This invoice is part of the recovery process. Payment will be processed after completion of recovery procedures.
Large amount invoice requiring treasury approval. Special processing procedures are being followed.
Invoice has been successfully processed and payment has been initiated. Confirmation will be sent via email.
